00037 bool V1731Board::Init( long     vme_handle)
00038 {
00039         if( !V17XXBoard::Init( vme_handle))
00040                 return false;
00041 
00042         // ADC Calibration
00043         UINT8 ch_msk= 0x00;
00044         //for( int i= 0; i< (UINT8)this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00045         //{
00046         //      ch_msk|= 1<< i;
00047         //}
00048         ch_msk= GetChEnableMsk();
00049 
00050         // Prompt odd channel disconnect here
00051         //if( this->m_is_des_mode) {
00052         //      wxMessageBox( wxT("CAENScope is about to perform an ADCs' calibration!\nPlease make sure that odd channels' signals are disconnected "), wxT("Warning"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_WARNING  );
00053         //}
00054         wxMessageBox( wxT("CAENScope is about to perform an ADCs' calibration!\nPlease make sure that channels' signals are disconnected "), wxT("Warning"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_WARNING  );
00055         
00056         if( !cvt_V1724_adc_calib( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data, ch_msk))
00057         {
00058                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during ADCs' calibration\n"));
00059         }       
00060         if( !cvt_V1724_software_reset( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data))
00061         {
00062                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during software reset .\n"));
00063         }       
00064 
00065         if( !cvt_V1724_set_des_mode( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data, this->m_is_des_mode? TRUE: FALSE))
00066         {
00067                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during cvt_V1724_set_des_mode execution \n"));
00068         }       
00069         // Repeat some initialization after software reset
00070 
00071         //
00072         // Write trigger mode
00073         if( !this->WriteTriggerMode( false))
00074                 return false;
00075         // 
00076         // Front Panel IO
00077         if( !this->SetFrontPanelIO( this->m_p_app_settings->m_use_TTL))
00078                 return false;
00079 
00080         return true;
00081 }
00082

00084 bool V1731Board::GetBoardMemory( UINT32 &num_ksamples_per_channel)
00085 {
00086         UINT32 reg_value32= 0;
00087 
00088         // 
00089         // read the board id
00090         if( !cvt_read( this->m_p_data, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_ADD, &reg_value32, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_AM, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_DATA_SIZE))
00091         {
00092                 return false;
00093         }
00094         num_ksamples_per_channel= CVT_V1724_GET_BRDINF_BLOCK_SIZE_KW( reg_value32);
00095         num_ksamples_per_channel*= 4;           // 8 bit data
00096         return true;
00097 }
